sn56.62:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn56.62:4.2: “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ—
sn56.62:4.3: yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
sn56.62:4.6: appamattakāyaṃ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito.
sn56.62:4.7: Saṅkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṃ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito”ti.
sn56.62:5.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appamattakā te sattā ye majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti;
sn56.62:5.2: atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti aviññātāresu milakkhesu … pe ….
